contents.title: The Redhead
contents.content: Tonight, Meredith, Emily, and I had dinner at Chick-Fil-A on campus.  (I ate all my food… it’s the little things, y’all.)  When we left the apartment, it looked a little stormy, but we decided not to turn around and get rain jackets.  Summer storms always blow over, right?  Wrong.  When we were ready to leave, from where we were sitting, it looked like it was still dry outside.  That is, until we walked out the door and were greeted by huge, giant, cold drops of rain… without rain jackets.

contents.title: The Blond
content: Okay, this is a two-parter. Firstly because they are short songs, and secondly because I don’t think I should get into a habit of posting movie music.
So here we go! First, a little dancin’ action from Tangled. You can start at the :30 mark if you’d like.
